Uses of Class
scala_maven.ScalaSourceMojoSupport

Packages that use ScalaSourceMojoSupport
scala_maven   
 

Uses of ScalaSourceMojoSupport in scala_maven
 

Subclasses of ScalaSourceMojoSupport in scala_maven
 class ScalaCompileMojo
          Compiles a directory of Scala source.
 class ScalaCompilerSupport
          Abstract parent of all Scala Mojo who run compilation
 class ScalaContinuousCompileMojo
          Compile the main and test scala source directory in continuous (infinite loop). !!
 class ScalaContinuousTestMojo
          Compile the main and test scala source directory then run unit test cases in continuous (infinite loop).
 class ScalaDocJarMojo
          Creates a jar of the non-aggregated scaladoc and attaches it to the project for distribution.
 class ScalaDocMojo
          Produces Scala API documentation.
 class ScalaGenJsonMojo
          Produces Scala API documentation in Json (use vscaladoc2_genjson).
 class ScalaTestCompileMojo
          Compile Scala test source into test-classes.
